org.uma.jmetal.measure.impl

Class BasicMeasure<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.uma.jmetal.util.naming.impl.SimpleDescribedEntity
      • org.uma.jmetal.measure.impl.SimpleMeasure<Value>
        • org.uma.jmetal.measure.impl.SimplePushMeasure<T>
          • org.uma.jmetal.measure.impl.BasicMeasure<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Measure<T>, PullMeasure<T>, PushMeasure<T>, DescribedEntity

    public class BasicMeasure<T>
extends SimplePushMeasure<T>
implements PullMeasure<T>, PushMeasure<T>
    A BasicMeasure provides a simple way to define a measure that merely stores a single value
    Author:
    Antonio J. Nebro
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
